mastergl.pdp

Interface StateChangeableVibrator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WayManager

    public interface StateChangeableVibrator
    Interface which offers the only methods a StateDirectionsHandler must use, which are vibrations methods and changing state method.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StateDirectionsHandler changeState(StateDirectionsHandler state)
      Change the state of the changeable class.
      void vibrateLeft()
      Vibrate when the user must turn to left on the next move.
      void vibrateRight()
      Vibrate when the user must turn to right on the next move.
      void vibrateWrongDirections()
      Vibrate when the user is in the wrong directions

    • Method Detail

      • changeState

        StateDirectionsHandler changeState(StateDirectionsHandler state)
        Change the state of the changeable class.
        Parameters:
        state - the state to set.
        Returns:
        the new state of the changeable.
        See Also:
        StateDirectionsHandler
